entry.title: $2700 // NO FEE~Luxury Carnegie Hill 1BR Gem*SS App*DW*RoofDeck*LAUNDRY*DOORMAN
entry.content:
NO FEE!! New Luxury Carnegie Hill 1BR Gem w/ Greenery Courtyard View*SS Appliances + Dishwasher*Roof Deck*LAUNDRY + Verizon Fios!

Best 1bedroom deal available in the building!

Introducing this BRAND NEW TRUE 1bedroom 1bathroom luxury beauty features a beautiful updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry + DISHWASHER, a large living room with large windows, and a KING size fitted bedroom with ample closet space. The unit also features ample and deep closets to maximize your storage needs.

Nestled in a Full Service Luxury BLDG with an array of amenities including a Roofdeck, laundry, 24/hr doorman/concierge services, valet, and also wired for Verizon FIOS.

Please call/text/email to schedule appointment

**Net Price advertised with 1m free on 12 m lease. Gross price is $2950
